original_text:
Beat the Beast Griffin’s Gold
Beat the Beast Griffin’s Gold è una slot machine prodotta dalla software house Thunderkick, che nel corso degli ultimi anni ci ha abituato a giochi sempre molto ben curati, con tematiche originali e compartimenti grafici eccellenti.
Per non smentirci, anche il tema di Beat the Beast Griffin’s Gold è particolarmente originale, nonostante si rifaccia ai miti e alle leggende del passato che sono stati ampiamente sfruttati nel mondo delle slot machine.
Beat the Beast Griffin’s Gold è la quinta di una serie di slot chiamata appunto Beat the Beast, che vede come protagonisti degli animali mitologici, il grifone in questo caso, animali presenti nella mitologia egizia, romana e persiana, che appaiono come degli ibridi tra un leone e un’aquila.
Simile alle altre slot machine della serie, Beat the Beast Griffin’s Gold offre una grafica di altissima qualità, con i rulli incorniciati d’oro e sullo sfondo le colonne di un grande tempio, con le vincite che danno vita ad animazioni ed effetti speciali sulla schermata.
Caratteristiche principali della slot machine
La struttura delle griglia di gioco di Beat the Beast Griffin’s Gold è quella tradizionale a cinque rulli e tre righe. Le linee di pagamento sono solo nove ma il range di scommessa è sufficientemente ampio: su questa bella slot di casa Thunderkick potrete infatti scommettere da un minimo di 10 centesimi fino a un massimo di 100 €n per ciascun giro.
Il gioco è caratterizzato da un’alta volatilità, e ciò implica che potreste dovervi armare di pazienza e attendere prima di ottenere delle vincite, ma che se sarete fortunati i premi ricompenseranno la vostra attesa!
Il potenziale di vincita di Beat the Beast Griffin’s Gold è molto alto: il premio massimo che ci si può portare a casa con questa slot è infatti pari a 22.000 volte il valore della vostra scommessa, davvero enorme!
Un altro punto a favore di questa slot machine è rappresentato dall’RTP (ritorno teorico al giocatore o return to player) che si attesta su un ottimo 96,13%, leggermente al di sopra della media.
Inoltre, Beat the Beast Griffin’s Gold è ottimizzato per essere giocato anche dai dispositivi mobili e, se lo volete, anche in modalità demo del tutto gratuita.
Simboli e funzionalità
I simboli, ordinati in base al loro valore, partono dai cosiddetti reali, le carte dal gioco dal 10 all’Asso, e continuano con alcuni simboli tematici a valore più alto, che includono una balestra, una piuma d’aquila, un’arpa, una statuetta che rappresenta un grifone e il grifone stesso.
L’icona del grifone ha una duplica funzione, rappresentando infatti sia il wild che lo Scatter, e determinando inoltre una vincita pari a 150 volte la puntata se compare su tutti i cinque rulli.
Scoprite poi le altre funzioni speciali che vi potranno far vincere fino a 22.222 volte la puntata!

raw_translation.response:
Beat the Beast Griffin’s Gold is a slot machine by Thunderkick, a software house known for its well-crafted games with original themes and excellent graphics. The theme of Beat the Beast Griffin’s Gold is particularly original, referencing myths and legends of the past that have been widely used in the world of slot machines. It is the fifth in a series of slots called Beat the Beast, featuring mythological animals like the griffin, which is a hybrid between a lion and an eagle.
Similar to the other slots in the series, Beat the Beast Griffin’s Gold offers high-quality graphics, with golden-framed reels and a backdrop of columns in a large temple. Winning combinations trigger animations and special effects on screen.
The game has a traditional five-reel, three-row grid with only nine paylines, but a wide betting range from 10 cents to 100€ per spin. It is highly volatile, so you may need patience before hitting big wins, but the potential payout is up to 22,000 times your bet. The RTP is an excellent 96.13%, slightly above average. Beat the Beast Griffin’s Gold is optimized for mobile devices and can be played in demo mode for free. 
Symbols range from playing cards 10 through Ace to higher-valued ones like a crossbow, eagle feather, harp, griffin figurine, and griffin. The griffin is both the wild and scatter symbol, triggering a win of 150 times your bet if it appears on all five reels. Discover the other special features that can earn you up to 22,222 times your bet! Experienced gamblers will appreciate the high volatility and potential payouts of this original and well-designed slot game.

response.headline: Gameplay and Special Features
response.content: Beat the Beast Griffin’s Gold is a high-volatility slot machine with 5 reels and 9 paylines. The game features both wild and scatter symbols, as well as a free spins mode. Landing three or more scatter symbols anywhere in view awards ten free spins. During the free spins mode, landing three or more scatter symbols again will re-trigger the mode. The game also features a bonus game where players can win up to 22,222 times their bet by filling the screen with griffin symbols.

The game captures the mythical theme well with symbols including an eagle feather, a harp, and a statue of a griffin.

response.headline: GAMEPLAY AND SPECIAL FEATURES
response.content:
Get ready to fly high with Beat the Beast Griffin’s Gold, one of the most exciting casino slot games out there today. This high-volatility slot machine with 5 reels and 9 paylines is sure to get your adrenaline pumping and your heart racing.

But don't worry - you're not alone on this adventure! The game features both wild and scatter symbols that will help you along the way to victory. And if you're lucky enough to land three or more scatter symbols anywhere in view, you'll be awarded ten free spins. Who doesn't love free spins?

During the free spins mode, it's a player's paradise as landing three or more scatter symbols again will re-trigger the mode. Boom! Say goodbye to the house edge and hello to winning big time.

And the best part? The game also features a bonus round where players can win up to 22,222 times their bet by filling the screen with griffin symbols! Talk about a golden opportunity to fill your pockets with some serious cash.

So, what are you waiting for? Come join the adventure and Beat the Beast Griffin’s Gold. We guarantee that you'll be on the edge of your seat the entire time - just be sure to hold on tight!

response.headline: Symbols and Theme
response.content:
Do you believe in mythical creatures? Then you're in luck, because Beat the Beast Griffin’s Gold has a griffin, and it's not afraid to use it! The theme of this slot game revolves around mystical beasts and legends, with symbols that are sure to transport you to a different world. The game's symbols include traditional royals, like the king and queen, but also a feather from an eagle and a harp that sounds more like a siren.

But of course, the highlight of the game is the legendary creature itself: the griffin. This creature serves as both the wild and scatter symbol, which means that no matter where it lands, it's a good thing. And if you're lucky enough to get it on all five reels, you could be in for a whopping payout worth up to 150 times your initial bet. That's what I call flying high!

The designers of this game really did an excellent job with the theme. It's not every day that you get to play a slot game that takes you on a journey to another world filled with fantasy and adventure. But with Beat the Beast Griffin’s Gold, you'll feel like you're right in the middle of a storybook. If you're a fan of myths and legends, this is definitely the game for you. If not, you might just discover a new appreciation for it!

Review:
 
Gameplay and Special Features

Beat the Beast Griffin’s Gold is a high-volatility slot machine with 5 reels and 9 paylines. The game features both wild and scatter symbols, as well as a free spins mode. Landing three or more scatter symbols anywhere in view awards ten free spins. During the free spins mode, landing three or more scatter symbols again will re-trigger the mode. The game also features a bonus game where players can win up to 22,222 times their bet by filling the screen with griffin symbols.

Graphics and Design

Beat the Beast Griffin’s Gold features excellent graphics, with detailed symbols and animations. The reels are framed in gold and set against the backdrop of a temple. The game captures the mythical theme well with symbols including an eagle feather, a harp, and a statue of a griffin.

Volatility and Payouts

Beat the Beast Griffin’s Gold is a high-volatility slot machine, which means that payouts can be infrequent but large. The game offers a maximum payout of 22,000 times the value of your bet, which is one of the highest payouts available in online slot machines.

Compatibility with Mobile Devices

Beat the Beast Griffin’s Gold is optimized for playing on mobile devices, including smartphones and tablets. The game is also available to play in demo mode for free.

Symbols and Theme

Beat the Beast Griffin’s Gold features a mythical theme, with symbols including traditional royals, an eagle feather, a harp, and a statue of a griffin. The griffin symbol serves as both the wild and scatter, offering payouts worth up to 150 times your bet if it lands on each reel. The game's theme is well executed and will be enjoyed by fans of mythical stories and legends.

The symbols, ordered by their value, start from the so-called royals, the cards from 10 to Ace, and continue with some higher value thematic symbols, including a crossbow, an eagle feather, a harp, a statue representing a griffin, and the griffin itself.

The icon of the griffin has a dual function, representing both the wild and the scatter, and determining a win equal to 150 times the bet if it appears on all five reels.

Discover other special features that can make you win up to 22,222 times your bet!
